description: Container is abstraction of a docker container or similar technology

imageUuid.description: If you are deploying a docker image enter a imageUuid in the format docker:<name>

system.description: Similar to the command field except that the string will be parsed similar to how the shell would parse it

command.description: The command in an array form

description: Represents a credential like an API key or username/password pair

kind.description: Enter kind=apiKey if you want an API key to be auto generated
